promptPrefix:
I want you to audit the pasted content and get it SEO optimized on what areas to improve and get more suggestions to rank better on search engines. I want you to respond only in one language [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Your task is to give SEO optimization suggestions in pointers and also internal linking suggestions. 
All the output shall be in [ENGLISH].

Also create a Meta title between 60-70 characters, and a Meta description below 160 characters. 

Give around 3-4 Title suggestions and also long-tail keyword suggestions that would be easy to rank.

The text to summarize would be 

[PROMPT]
title: SEO Content Optimization and Suggestions
